name: Google Ad Conversions Plugin (with Zapier)
description: Sends Google Ads conversion events to a Zapier webhook

config.markdown: Conversion definitions (JSON): See `conversion_definitions.example.json` in the plugin repository. Zapier webhook URL: Full URL of the webhook, e.g. `https://hooks.zapier.com/hooks/catch/0123456/abcdef/`

config.name: Conversion definitions (JSON)
config.default: [{"conversionName":"Sign up - self-hosted paid","eventDetails":{"event":"$autocapture","text":"verify card","href":null,"url":"https://license.posthog.com/","url_matching":"contains"}},{"conversionName":"Sign up - self-hosted free","eventDetails":{"event":"$pageview","text":null,"href":null,"url":"https://posthog.com/signup/self-host/deploy","url_matching":"contains"}},{"conversionName":"Sign up - self-hosted free","eventDetails":{"event":"$pageview","text":"posthog cloud","href":null,"url":"https://app.posthog.com/signup","url_matching":"contains"}}]
